description: Kd(PAR)1 is calculated for a layer, which thickness is equal to [Kd(490)]?1
method: calculated from 30-day avg. Kd490 (AMODIS) using eq. 9 in Morel et al. (2007) (URI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.rse.2007.03.012)

description: Kd(PAR)2 is calculated for a layer, which thickness is equal to 2*[Kd(490)]?1
method: calculated from 30-day avg. Kd490 (AMODIS) using eq. 9' in Morel et al. (2007) (URI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.rse.2007.03.012)

description: NA
method: Measured in situ

description: at the sampling location for a period of 8 days around the sampling date

description: zeu(0.415) is the depth of the 0.415 mol quanta m^-2 day^-1 light level, zeu(1%) was calculated from z(SD) using equation 18 in Morel et al. (2007) and converted to zeu(0.415) using equations in Boss and Berhenfeld (2010)
method: calculated from z(Secchi Disk) and 30-day average daily PAR (AMODIS) (URI: https://doi.org/10.1029/2010GL044174)

description: zeu(0.415) is the depth of the 0.415 mol quanta m^-2 day^-1 light level, zeu(1%) was converted to zeu(0.415) using equations in Boss and Berhenfeld (2010
method: calculated from Kd(PAR)1 and 30-day avg. daily surface PAR (AMODIS) (URI: https://doi.org/10.1029/2010GL044174)

description: zeu(0.415) is the depth of the 0.415 mol quanta m^-2 day^-1 light level, zeu(1%) was converted to zeu(0.415) using equations in Boss and Berhenfeld (2010
method: calculated from Kd(PAR)2 and 30-day avg. daily surface PAR (AMODIS) (URI: https://doi.org/10.1029/2010GL044174)
